# The `AtomicCmpXchgInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An instruction that atomically checks whether a specified value is in a memory location, and, if it is, stores a new value there. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An instruction that atomically checks whether a specified value is in a memory location, and, if it is, stores a new value there.

The value returned by this instruction is a pair containing the original value as first element, and an i1 indicating success (true) or failure (false) as second element.

Definition at line 501 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.

## Private Member Attributes

### SSID {#ab0a1c86e4834a9a1f12c8f8eacee4773}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="SyncScope::ID llvm::AtomicCmpXchgInst::SSID">
The synchronization scope <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of this cmpxchg instruction.

Not quite enough room in SubClassData for everything, so synchronization scope <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> gets its own field.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l00686">686</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l00631">631</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.

### getStrongestFailureOrdering() {#a7ce03ab5b2a6006ebcdfe804e4c8f1a1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static AtomicOrdering llvm::AtomicCmpXchgInst::getStrongestFailureOrdering (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7">AtomicOrdering</a> SuccessOrdering)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Returns the strongest permitted ordering on failure, given the desired ordering on success.

If the comparison in a cmpxchg operation fails, there is no atomic store so release semantics cannot be provided. So this function drops explicit Release requests from the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7">AtomicOrdering</a>. A SequentiallyConsistent operation would remain SequentiallyConsistent.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l00652">652</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l00574">574</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.
